description: From work +‎ -some. Cognate with German wirksam (“effective, operative, effectual”), Swedish verksam (“active, operative”), Old English weorcsum (“laborious, painful”).

adjectives.description: worksome (comparative more worksome, superlative most worksome)

examples: At the very beginnings of his governance time began to show how turbulent and worksome it was going to be,  […]
